languages.text: "Вы правы. Я расскажу подробнее. Все дело в... обстоятельствах моего прибытия на Футфол".

traits.locale_text: "Вы прав{mf||ы}. Я расскажу подробнее. Все дело в... обстоятельствах моего прибытия на Футфол".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "You're right. I will explain. It's about the... circumstances of my arrival on Footfall."

languages.text: “你说得没错，我来解释一下吧。那是……我刚到落脚港的时候发生的事情。”
languages.original_text: "You're right. I will explain. It's about the... circumstances of my arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，我来解释一下吧。那是……我刚到落脚港的时候发生的事情。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Tiene razón, se lo explicaré. Es sobre las... circunstancias de mi llegada a Paso».
languages.original_text: "You're right. I will explain. It's about the... circumstances of my arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón, se lo explicaré. Es sobre las... circunstancias de mi llegada a Paso».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そうだな。説明しよう。それは…フットフォールに我が到着したときの状況についてです」
languages.original_text: "You're right. I will explain. It's about the... circumstances of my arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだな。説明しよう。それは…フットフォールに我が到着したときの状況についてです」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Ich werde es erklären. Es geht um ... die Umstände meiner Ankunft auf Footfall."
languages.original_text: "You're right. I will explain. It's about the... circumstances of my arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Ich werde es erklären. Es geht um ... die Umstände meiner Ankunft auf Footfall."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, je vais vous expliquer. C'est à propos des... circonstances de mon arrivée à Castel. »
languages.original_text: "You're right. I will explain. It's about the... circumstances of my arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, je vais vous expliquer. C'est à propos des... circonstances de mon arrivée à Castel. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Haklısın. İzah edeceğim. Mesele... Binliman'a geliş koşullarımla ilgili."
languages.original_text: "You're right. I will explain. It's about the... circumstances of my arrival on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Ne desen haklısın… O yüzden açıklayacağım. Bu zaaf… Binliman'a gelişimin koşullarıyla ilgili."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
